<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108809</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108809</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The three "R's" of conservation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die drei "r" Erhaltung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les trois "r" d'économie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os três "r" do conservation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I tre "r" di conservazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα τρία "ρ" της συντήρησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los tres "r" de conservación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The conservation of our resources is in the hands of every individual. Students need to learn the effect of recycling, reusing, and reducing has on our environment and what they can do.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Erhaltung unserer Betriebsmittel ist in den 
Händen jeder Einzelperson. Kursteilnehmer müssen erlernen, 
daß der Effekt der Wiederverwertung, des Wiederverwendens und des 
Verringerns auf unserer Umgebung hat und was sie tun können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'économie de nos ressources est aux mains de 
chaque individu. Les étudiants doivent apprendre que l'effet de
la réutilisation, de la réutilisation, et de la réduction a sur 
notre environnement et ce qu'elles peuvent faire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conservation de nossos recursos está nas mãos 
de cada indivíduo. Os estudantes necessitam aprender que o 
efeito de recycling, do reúso, e de se reduzir tem em nosso ambiente 
e o que pode fazer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La conservazione delle nostre risorse è nelle 
mani di ogni individuo. Gli allievi devono imparare che 
l'effetto del riciclaggio, di riutilizzazione e di riduzione ha sul 
nostro ambiente e che cosa possono fare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συντήρηση των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς μας είναι στα 
χέρια κάθε ατόμου. Οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να μάθουν την 
επίδραση της ανακύκλωσης, επαναχρησιμοποίηση, και η μείωση έχει 
στο περιβάλλον μας και τι μπορούν να κάνουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La conservación de nuestros recursos está en las
manos de cada individuo. Los estudiantes necesitan aprender que 
el efecto del reciclaje, de la reutilización, y de la reducción 
tenga en nuestro ambiente y qué él puede hacer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GEOL 130
FN:GEOL 130
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204446</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108809</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-three-rs-of-conservation</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
